Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/10/1987 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Injured on 8/30/1989 with a Concussion, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from San Diego to Pittsburgh on 6/24/1990 (Going to SD: P John Smiley, SS Bip Roberts. Going to PIT: P Dennis Burlingame, P Roger Pavlik, P Andy Pettitte, P Joel Johnston, SS Carlos Baerg
a)...
Had first career hit on 7/5/1990, off Bruce Ruffin (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/4/1990, off Shawn Hillegas (ATL)...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 4/13/1991...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Atlanta on 4/3/1992 (Going to PIT: P Kiki Jones. Going to ATL: SS Carlos Baerga)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 6/9/1992...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 6/10/1992...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/11/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1992, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1992, hitting .419 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,421,429 through salary arbitration...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Philadelphia on 4/13/1993...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles on 4/16/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1993, hitting .629 with 6 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
7/5/1993: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $6,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
